scripts.dev:protocol: pnpm --filter protocol run update-abis && pnpm --filter protocol run dev
scripts.dev:app: pnpm --filter protocol run update-abis && pnpm --filter app run dev
scripts.dev:docs: pnpm --filter protocol run update-abis && pnpm --filter docs run dev
scripts.dev:website: pnpm --filter protocol run update-abis && pnpm --filter website run dev
scripts.dev:data: pnpm --filter protocol run update-abis && concurrently "pnpm --filter data run start:api" "pnpm --filter data run start:market" "pnpm --filter data run start:chain"
